execution_quality: Execution was direct and efficient—a single edit was made based on clear user instruction without hesitation or unnecessary exploration.
work_category: Simple code modification following user direction to require a module instead of an alternative implementation approach.
summary: User provided explicit direction to try the second option (requiring the module), the agent implemented it cleanly in a single edit, and the session ended without further requests. Perfect alignment with user intent and clean execution.
follow_up_pattern: Session terminated with no follow-up, indicating the user accepted the change and moved on.
